instructions: # Character Sheet This is a character sheet for the german rpg ABOREA. It was inspired by the Pathfinder character sheet of the roll20 community. At this time the only available language is german. ##  Adjustments For the calculation of some values in the character sheet you need to run a specific API-script or you have to make some adjustments to get the full potential of the sheet: For full autocalculation you need the "Aborea Character Sheet AutoCalculations.js" to run (roll20 PRO user only). If you are a no PRO user at roll20 you can set the (otherwise calculated) fields manually at the last red tab in the sheet by yourself. ##  Getting help Please read the [Aborea Character Sheet Documentation](https://wiki.roll20.net/Aborea_Character_Sheet).
